lines.text: Okay, here's the idea: they needed to get the wire out of the fire, right?
It sort of gave the hay thing away- they needed to dispose of that evidence for some reason.
But if it was hot from the flames, he didn't want to grab it without protection, so...
He coated himself in cement to avoid getting burned!
And it dried before he could do that. Done.
...You don't think he'd have just worn gloves? Or used a potholder, or somethin'?
Maybe he didn't have those things!
How about his robe? That woulda done just fine, right?
Maybe he didn't want to ruin his robe with a scorch mark! Maybe vanity was involved!
...So, he didn't want to ruin his robe, so he soaked the entire thing, and himself, in liquid cement.
...I didn't say it was a plausible idea.
